PCMAliasBlockFile Class Reference

#include <PCMAliasBlockFile.h>

Inheritance diagram for PCMAliasBlockFile:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

An AliasBlockFile that references uncompressed data in an existing file.

Public Member Functions

 PCMAliasBlockFile (wxFileName baseFileName, wxFileName aliasedFile, sampleCount aliasStart, sampleCount aliasLen, int aliasChannel)

Member Function Documentation

int PCMAliasBlockFile::ReadData ( samplePtr  data,
sampleFormat  format,
sampleCount  start,
sampleCount  len 
) [virtual]

Reads the specified data from the aliased file using libsndfile.

Reads the specified data from the aliased file, using libsndfile, and converts it to the given sample format.

Parameters:
data The buffer to read the sample data into.
format The format to convert the data into
start The offset within the block to begin reading
len The number of samples to read

Implements AliasBlockFile.
